title: TECK Community
description: A virtual community and mentorship program providing free access to technical education, resources,Â  a safe community, and employment placement opportunities for formerly incarcerated and those impacted by the criminal legal system.

tracks.title: Digital Literacy
tracks.description: 5-month instructor-based classes followed up with individual sessions with an industry professional mentor equipping mentees with skills in computer system navigation, Google Suite, project management and much more!

tracks.title: UI/UX Design
tracks.description: 5-month instructor-based classes followed up with individual sessions with an industry professional mentor equipping mentees with skills in visual design, wireframing, userflows, project management and much more!

title: T.RAP
description: An in-person program for system or justice impacted youth providing key support to achieve outlined professional and personal goals, work readiness and digital literacy training and connection to employment opportunities.
